question:
Nowadays on-line shopping has become more popular than in-store shopping. Is it a positive or a negative development? 
Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant example from your own knowledge or experience.
text: In the recent years, the world of all nations is growing day by day with many ways. The trend of purchasing new items from online has become a major development for the nation. It has occupied the place of stores. I judge that it is a positive growth. There are many reasons behind this phenomenon. In the below paragraphs, I would like to discuss the causes as well as my own opinion.
